Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.model

Class ModelView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.model.ModelView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ModelView extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a serialized view of the game model that contains essential information for clients. This class provides getters to access various aspects of the game state.
See Also:
